name: 风起苍岚
description:
1. Integrating ancient mythology as the theme, the mainland of China is temporarily touched by evil spirits, with a full 3D free perspective, experiencing a hundred beautiful picture maps.
2. Can flirt with younger sisters, hold a grand parade of 100 people in the entire server, fight with hundreds of people, and cross server seize the lead and change fate.
3. All kinds of cute pets, mounts, and fashion are available, and the explosive rate of teaming up to fight monsters has doubled. The ever-changing fashion is unique.
4. It is a classic sequel with millions of players, returning to the ancient world of immortality and chivalry, and enthusiastically experiencing the world of immortality and chivalry.
publishers: 唯美转生仙侠，邀您再续前生缘！
